Additional Comments: Chris was extremely helpful. He corrected my issue with a book order very quickly and was very courteous.

The chat function was quick and easy to use during a busy school day.  I really appreciated the representative's patience with me, willingness to answer my questions, and thoroughness in verifying the information she gave me.  It made a stressful situation much easier.
No other comments.  I am always impressed and happy when I need to talk to Scholastic Customer Service.  Fast and friendly help, always!
My issue was addressed within minutes and the advice given was exactly what I needed to do.  Thank you!

I am frustrated that when my payment was not submitted the first time and I called to correct it and DID correct it by paying over the phone, that I then had to follow up again months later and provide a copy of my credit card transaction because scholastic is unable to record keep their own payments. Makes me vary to use it again.
The representative was great. Your policies are fucking bullshit

Send accurate information in emails to me.  You sent me an order that a parent placed online.  It was not accurate information.  They placed an order for around $20 and you told me the order was around $80.
My experience was great. The customer service person was very polite and helpful.
A parent has ordered and has an order number, but I have no way to check the status of thier order. Parent says the order should be shipped to the school, but I have no record.
My last order became lost for over a month!
I don't recall contacting anyone at Scholastic other than placing an order.  If someone called and spoke with a representative, then it wasn't me.
Need an easier way for educators to get in contact with the department they need.  I started in chat, then had to phone in, then was transferred twice  before I spoke to the right person.
I have dealt with Scholastic since the 1980’s. Back before the online stuff and in ALL of these years, I have ONLY had positive experiences!!!! Thank you!

I wish there was a quicker easier way to cancel/change catalogs coming to the schools. We throw out so many and it’s a waste of paper. I am another teacher and take the time to notify you but I’m sure there are many other schools who don’t. We get a lot of duplicates and a lot for teachers not at our site.

It's been over 4 weeks since my order wasn't fulfilled. There should be a better system in place to detect orders like mine.  And most importantly, missing orders should be expedited, 7 to 10 days is not acceptable.
One box was not included in our large shipment (450 books).  I was told that it would be arriving the next day, but it still has not arrived separate from the original order.

I ordered 10 books, took 3 months to get to me, box was destroyed and 3 books were missing and 2 were damaged. Your company offered to replace them. I asked to please send them to my home address instead of my school address as I didn’t want to wait 3 more months and risk the same issue. I had a very curt email from Heather stating this was not possible.

I ordered 10 books, took 3 months to get to me, box was destroyed and 3 books were missing and 2 were damaged. Your company offered to replace them. I asked to please send them to my home address instead of my school address as I didn’t want to wait 3 more months and risk the same issue. I had a very curt email from Heather stating this was not possible.
Customer service was polite, but OH MY GOSH all the info they wanted was crazy and very time consuming. I spent my entire prep period and haven't heard back that the problem was resolved.
I was very pleased with how quick the response was! Thank you!
No concerns. You’re response time was great

I made an error while ordering, and as soon as I noticed I reached out via email. Joshua and Jared both had replied within the string as I had a follow up question and were fantastic in helping to solve and assuring me that this wouldn’t impact the offer used for one of my children! Thanks for being so quick, professional and kind in a resolution! My kids always look forward to their new books!
Why if the automatic voice system asks for your account doesn’t the representation have that info?
I appreciate getting the link to the book of the week almost immediately when I couldn't find it anywhere on my computer. Thank you.
Staci was great. I didn't really know who I needed to talk to or how to get the information we needed, but she was persistent and helped.
I ordered catalogs and they still are not here
Someone finally gave me my acess code at Lipscomb Elementary third grade.
It is silly that I cant print an invoice.  We work off of POs and to have to call to have the invoice sent every month is a hassle.  Should be something we can print when we need it.
Problem was taken care of quickly, which was much appreciated. :)
Your website isn't the most user friendly. I ended up calling in to take care of an order.
Let customers know of website changes.
More detailed instructions included when the papers are sent out.  We were also missing our envelope.

You need to change everything about your online ordering systems. First of all, list all of the available titles. This needs to all be in one place. Just list them and create a column that shows how to purchase it. There's shouldn't be one catalog for book club, one catalog for non book clubs, one invisible catalog if a teacher decides to order through a rep. It is impossible to ascertain whether you have any particular title available. Also, at the very least let your book club service reps access the non book club catalogs and vice versa. Secondly, what is your fixation with getting teachers involved in the parent ordering process? It literally took me four minutes yesterday to rubber stamp a parent order. Why??? Not necessary. And if I don't approve it, the books never ship out. And it takes forever to get your books! The whole system is so terribly antiquated it is like pulling teeth ordering through the web site! I still don't even know if I can purchase the Spanish translations of the Guardians of Ga'hoole series through your site. Probably have to get a rep involved. And then I won't be able to use my points. SO frustrating!

Just wish there was more explaination for tax exempt for schools and how that works.  Also if a teacher makes a wish list that it is available for parents to view and purchase items of your wish list even if it is from the teacher store section.
The options for choosing paper flyers of Club Leo by grade level is not an option.

I have requested paper flyers a few different times now and was wondering why they are still not being automatically sent for each month.  The date I sent for parents to order has, once again, come and gone, and still no flyers. My parents do not order if I don't give them hands-on flyers.  I got one online order this month.  Now, when the flyers do arrive, I can try again, but it would be too late for any incentives for me and my class.  I am disappointed, to say the least.
Your rep. made me aware of the FACE ? program, which was very nice, and saved us money

Have been a member for over 20 years and the fact that you still charge me for shipping is unacceptable. There is absolutely no reason for me to promote purchasing when  there is no more incentive for teachers - it only costs more now.

The first guy I talked to said let me put you on hold while I look into it and transfered me with out alerting me. Was pretty rude. The final person that helped me finally got my problem resolved that I have been calling and e-mail about since summer. Pretty poor on your end to accept checks and never process them correctly and then take so much time to fix your mistakes. Frustrating expierence to say the least.
Provide online payment option for using campaign funds for subscriptions.
Customer service representative was gracious and helpful, and resolved the issue extremely quickly!

They gave me information but I am still going to have to contact them again, after my order arrives. I was charged taxes, despite the fact that my school has tax exempt on file with scholastic.  Perhaps include somewhere where the purchaser does not have to make contact after the purchase to get a correct invoice. My finance department will not accept an invoice with taxes on it.  It makes for more work.
Book #7 was missing, I had 2 book sixes!

I appreciate your company & all your hard work. I think if a parent order sits in an account longer than a week then an email should be sent to the teacher letting her know. Thank you! : ) I'm still waiting for a response to further investigation of my email issue.
I would like to get magazines and an order number for my parents to be able to order books
I called your company 3 times about the same issue.  I then emailed you.  It was then fixed.  To improve on your end, fix it with the first contact.
I have not received the books yet.
Nothing that can I think of. People were very quick to respond to my email.
Waiting to receive the reads coupon for my next order since i forgot to submit on my last order. Thank you for your time.

The customer support representatives I was in contact with were responsive and professional. They helped answer my questions right away. However, I am disappointed in Scholastic overall. My question was about finding books with LGBTQ+ characters in the Book Club/flyers. There weren't any! The representatives directed me to where I could purchase some titles under the Teacher Store and the Scholastic store. Obviously they don't have the ability to add them to the book club/flyers. That isn't their responsibility. But whoever makes decisions about book purchasing for the book clubs should know-- I won't be the only one to have noticed the lack of LGBTQ+ content/characters in the books. I appreciate that you've provided a diverse books flyer, but the fact that it excludes books with LGBTQ+ characters is concerning. Thank you for your time. Sincerely, Caitlin Waddell-Chow waddell-chowc@pvpusd.net
I asked for a copy of invoices to be emailed to me and I still have not yet received them.
It just went away. The conversation just stopped. Odd.

I didn't know I had to basically authorize a parent's online order....I don't remember reading anything about that and I know this order sat for a while before being processed.  I just wish I had been notified weeks earlier about the order submission.
She was wonderful to work with this morning via chat.  She gave me an answer and provided an update to my account relatively quickly.  Thank you so much (and my consultant)!!!!
The website is not easy to navigate to order books.
Staci was great! My order was lost and she replaced it for us. Shipping was very quick. Thank you!!

Even though I show everything I have done with your company is paid, I'm receiving emails and letters that I have a balance. I am willing to just pay it, even though I don't think I should be paying it, just to stop the madness. I am frustrated, so don't want to call and be unkind to anyone. Give me a dang place to login and pay like every other company out there. My chat got disconnected, but the follow up email was helpful. I have nothing negative to say about today's experience. She said I have a zero balance, but I am receiving letters for a balance due. I also got an email, that I responded to and have not received a response. At this point, I'm ready to find somewhere else to get my son's books. I'm frustrated enough, that speaking to someone on the phone isn't a good idea. Even though I show everything I've done with you has been paid, I was willing to pay it just to get it gone. I can't even just log in somewhere and pay it. It's terrible customer service.

I didn’t get an answer to my question.  I searched my email to see if I missed it but couldn’t find anything.  I just need to cancel a parent order from November and she will re order for January. Thanks!!
I asked to order paper catalog  I was on hold over 5 minutes and had to give up.
I asked to order paper catalog  I was on hold over 5 minutes and had to give up.

The customer service rep through chat was very patient while I gave her each individual order number. I appreciated that, working in a school sometimes you are wearing many hats and being able to do a chat and have my issue resolved was perfect!
The person I spoke with immediately resolved the problem and provided additional customer appreciation compensation. I am thankful it was so easy.
I was called away unexpectedly and the representative closed the chat. The issue isn't making sense anyway as we have paid every PO that we have been sent.
Maybe offer a suggestion on how to help?

The guaranteed delivery prior to Christmas was not granted.  I still haven't received my box.  It would have been nice if you were to contact me to let me know it was lost.  Or, offer something to make up for the lack of guarantee.

In the past you have given teaching posters many months with a poster that goes with one of the monthly themes. I know this is a digital age, but there are less & less posters. You had quality posters that really helped enhance the units. I would appreciate more of them included again.
I appreciate the promptness in your response in getting back to me about the monies that is a credit on my teacher account.
I was embarrassed that the error was on my own doing. I had an incorrect address, and yet I was treated with such understanding and compassion.

I'm unsure why this digital order seemed to disappear. I received an email about it being in my account. The parent paid and it was shown to her to be there.  When I went to my cart, it was gone. Due to the timing, I couldn't resolve it. (December) I had to wait until we came back to school in January. Resolve is just we don't have the books, here is your money back. As the teacher, I'm upset because I feel this will damage the parent's drive to buy her son books. She may not do that again. It isn't just the bonus points for me, it's that fact that he is a struggling reader and participant in school, but I feel that by ordering books, he will engage more and have happier memories of school. I do have to give credit the parent's money is being refunded, as it should. Thank you.
A parent placed an order. I cannot find it. How do I get to it to make it ship? The person on the live chat connected, said nothing, and disconnected.
A parent placed an order. I cannot find it. How do I get to it to make it ship? The person on the live chat connected, said nothing, and disconnected.
I felt the issue was resolved.
Emily and Meagan were very helpful, past all my expectations!  Thank you!
I was very thankful that the book order discrepancy was resolved so easily. Thanks!
My book order was not delivered and they told me that there was no way to recover the information.  This was my second call about the order.
I’m still not sure which order/book was cancelled as unavailable but CS rep is still helping me

First time looking at your website and interested in purchasing books for new program I am getting ready to start. No one was available to talk to and as of yet no one got back with me. Not a huge deal but I would have liked to talked with someone.
The customer service rep was very quick to answer me and helped me solve my issue.
Next time, Let me know that the teacher never submit order.  So I do something about it. The time frame was too long.
It took three months for me to call six times to get my misplaced order refunded to my credit card. I got hung up on, told it was my mistake and so no free expedited shipping for my December order.
On the website, it's not very clear where or how to use bonus points.  The chat feature was very helpful, though!

I understand that the catalogs you send out are done months in advance however since I need more I have to wait for more to be delivered to me. I have never changed my class size so I do not know why i am receiving less this year than last year.

A parent ordered a book in Nov. The book never came. I could not find the book in my cart so I tried to order it myself with my own money. The system was requiring I assign a student name, age, birthdate, etc. to the order, so I stopped the order and contacted Scholastic. Their response was that I had the book in my cart, I just needed to push the order through electronically. I tried explaining that it was actually the book I tried to order but couldn't because I didn't know the birthdate of the student. They responded saying they did not understand what the issue was.  So I just made up a birth date for the kid and ordered the book with my own Paypal account. The issue is solved...by me. Thanks, Lisa Barry
I am not getting my flyers each month. I have to keep contacting you. I still do not have January.
I appreciated the quick response to my email!

I actually never contacted support services - my coworker Karen Bartscher did so I'm not sure why I received this e-mail - it is quite frustrating that now Mrs. Bartscher and my account have seemed to merge for no apparent reason. I have no idea why I have a balance on my account - my coworker informed me that my name was showing up on her scholastic book account - mine still shows the correct information - however it now shows I have an outstanding balance of $33 which is actually the outstanding balance of my co-worker Karen Bartscher

I actually never contacted support services - my coworker Karen Bartscher did so I'm not sure why I received this e-mail - it is quite frustrating that now Mrs. Bartscher and my account have seemed to merge for no apparent reason. I have no idea why I have a balance on my account - my coworker informed me that my name was showing up on her scholastic book account - mine still shows the correct information - however it now shows I have an outstanding balance of $33 which is actually the outstanding balance of my co-worker Karen Bartscher

I placed an order well in advance of Christmas., in hopes that the books would arrive for my niece for Christmas. Yet, after New Years my order had not yet shipped.   This entire ordering experience was a complete failure on Scholastic’s part. No communication on order delays. Unacceptable.
Unsubscribe someone when they've asked to be unsubscribed

I love the value you provide families and teachers! Also, the Judy Newman site is a big hit with my kids. On this occasion I forgot to add the code for bonus points and this was taken care of immediately. As a Green apple member, I also am to receive a set of books with my order, but the order was confusing. It would be great to have rewards or extras we automatically prepopulated when you reached the mininum.

If a customer has a balance on their account, they should be notified sooner.  A year later is unacceptable. It wasn't the service for the day, but I don't know why I wasn't notified until a year later that I had a balance on my account.   That's bad practice.
Scholastic was very prompt in getting back with me and very helpful solving my problems!
I appreciated the time in which you addressed my concern.
The person helping me was right on point.  I got the catalogs today, but she also said that if I didn't so contact her again.  Very helpful!

I work with a park district preschool program that is tax exempt.  One of my teachers placed an order for classroom books in November.  The invoice she sent to me noted an adjustment for the tax originally charged, leaving our total at $29.  HOWEVER, our credit card statement showed the full amount of $30.81, which included tax.  I called Scholastic numerous times sometimes to no answer, sometimes had a very poor (inaudible) connection.  Finally, via email, i was assured that the tax had been credited back to the card, even receiving an emailed letter/receipt on January 5.  Today (1//9/23), I have yet to see the credit back to the card used. Honestly, I realize that $1.81 is not a lot of money.  Unfortunately, it is also something that I need to report to & justify to our business office, and I have now spent far too much time following up on the issue, without resolution.  This just isn't the service I'd become used to from Scholastic over the last 15+ years I have worked with them, first as a classroom teacher, and now as a program supervisor.
I have not received the second box of books that I ordered before Christmas.

My book box was eventually delivered because I took my own time to look up the order status and contact the post office. I don't feel that it's my job to track your packages. I have always had great service from your company before and you seem to understand how precious teachers' time is them so I was disappointed that I had to take my planning time to try to resolve a problem that I was never notified about by Scholastic in the first place.
I asked for a quote.  I have not received it yet.
I wish the price of the book on the October book club order would have been honored. We can't buy the book for the whole school at the new price.
Offered the books I was looking for
The Scholastic representative was very professional and explained the billing process to me.  I appreciated her help.
the books should have been delivered before xmas to my school
The customer service was good. I was just frustrated the incident happened to begin with, after I was hesitant to try using Scholastic again.
I haven't received classroom fliers consistently.

Here is the email record after I called to inquire about being able to use very old Bonus Point Certificates.     Good evening,  I apologize about the delay in sending you this e-mail. I wanted to make sure all the information that I'm giving you is accurate and correct, so that you can get as much help as possible.   I went ahead and inquired into the legacy bonus point coupons that you have, and we are more than happy to see what we can do regarding getting those rewards applied to your account. In order to do this, it is recommended you make copies of the original bonus point coupons for your records, and then mail in the original slips to our Book Clubs payments address for evaluation. The Book Clubs payments address is included below, for your convenience.   Scholastic Inc. Book Club  Po BOX: 630446  Cincinnati, OH 45263-0446  Fax Number: 800-223-4011  Additionally, with the coupons, you will need to include your current account information, preferably your account number and name. This process can take several weeks to resolve, so I do apologize in advance for any inconvenience, but I do feel passionately about getting our teachers the rewards they deserve for all of their service, so I wanted to give you as much information as possible. I will say there is no guarantee that these will be able to be successfully added to your account, however I do hope this information was helpful and I would like to thank you for your patience with Scholastic today.  If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or call Customer Service at 1-800-724-6527.  Thank you,  Hannah   Julie Winter Sat, Jan 7, 2:37 PM (1 day ago) Hello Hannah,I sent my old Bonus Points certificates in a couple months ago and haven't heard anything. How do I know if they were credited to my account?Does s  bookclubs@scholasticmail.scholastic.com Sat, Jan 7, 2:50 PM (1 day ago) to me  Julie,  I am not seeing at this time that the bonus point certificates you mailed in have been applied. You are welcome to fax those back in with a note attached asking for a reply as to the statues of the request.  I hope this helps you. If you have any questions or concerns please don't hesitate to reply to this email or call Customer Service at 1-800-724-6527     Thank You,   Donna J From: jwinter@learncharter.org Sent: Sat Jan 07 2023 14:37:18 GMT-0600 (Central Standard Time) To: bookclubs@scholasticmail.scholastic.com Subject: Re: Legacy Bonus Points for Your Scholastic Account

I ordered books supposedly to be delivered to the house and that I ordered the books thru school/teacher and did not realized that the teacher has to "activate" the request. I thought money was taken out and that i need to check my scholastics order form to make sure that my money was not been taken out. My card that was used was closed due to fraudulent activities and can no longer access it if ever it was used for the order. I waited for a while and no response from the company ever said that the books had not been delivered or that I have to wait for the teacher to do so. Some books that I ordered were no longer available and past the time it was supposed to be available and that I am really disappointed with this outcome.

I wanted catalogs sent to my home address and you said no.it has been done this way for yrs.  My school loses them. Probably will not be ordering anymore because of this.my parents love the catalogs, not online ordering.
Loved the quick response.  Thank you.
I like the chat feature. I received the answers I needed.

I just did on one of the previous questions. PLEASE CHANGE MY ADDRESS ON THE ACCOUNT TO MY HOME ADDRESS: 920 FIRETHORN PLACE, LEXINGTON, KY 40515. I have tried over and over to no avail to get the address changed for my account. Our school is on a horse farm and mail and packages are frequently left out in the weather -- obviously not good for books or mail. I need to have EVERYTHING (order forms and books) mailed to my home: 920 Firethorn Place, Lexington, KY 40515.  The last contact I had said she would send the order forms to me. Then I got an email saying the forms had been sent to the school address. It cannot be that difficult to change an address!
Need monthly fliers, never received December or January. I have been active several years and ordered 3 months already this school year. Why can't I get the monthly fliers sent to me?
I am very pleased with Scholastic. Whenever I have had a missing item Scholastic has always made it right.   Love Scholastic Book Clubs

It used to be that I got flyers in the box with the books when they arrived and usually got at least one other in the mail.   Now I have to call and order flyers every month.  I realize there was a lot of waste in the first way but instead of stopping both you should have just stopped one.perhaps if you just sent a SeeSaw, Lucky, Arrow, and TAB to Trego School each month.  The teachers can divide them up between ouselves.
I figured it out.  I wanted information on how to refer a teacher to the Scholastic Reading Program.  Your represenative's responses weren't very detailed.  I had to keep asking clarifying questions.
She was very helpful and friendly.

I sent an email last night.  I was very dissatisfied with the way the conversation by phone was handled.  I am hoping it is fixed.  I was told to just give the teacher a list of books I want but the books I want for my daughter are not even on the order form so I have no clue how to know if they're even really available.
I appreciate being contacted so promptly by one of your associates.
I'll need to speak with someone in order to navigate the order.  The given directions meant nothing to me.
Prompt and polite response.  It was very appreciated.

The person I chatted with was very short with me. I am a teacher in a classroom setting and she left me very little time to respond back via chat session. She also was not able to resolve my issue. A duplicate book was sent to me by Scholastic's mistake. She said that I have to resend all the books back within the pack. The books have already been distributed to others. I feel like in order to solve this problem, a new pack should be sent to me, especially since I have heard Scholastic's customer service is superior- which, at this time, I would not agree with. She left our session without me feeling like Scholastic did what they could to make this right since it wasn't my mistake.
Brian, the customer service rep was a bit rude in his response.  Pretty surprising...

Still will shop on scholastics, I have 3 kids and they are very reasonably priced for books I know one day they will put grow. Just sucks I won’t get the ones ordered. Ordered books back in august.. I know they take a minute to ship pout and get through the teachers.. but then when I did reach out, I found out that my order expired.. that’s kinda upsetting that I didn’t get a notification or anything letting me know. 😕 I even talked to the teacher in September and she said she saw my order and that scholastics didn’t accept it yet to process it.. so I lost out on my whole order only because  the deal’s expired but felt like that wasn’t my fault.
Got back to me very quickly with a great help.  Thank you!

It was not an issue this time but sometimes it is hard when I get a different person each time I respond to a message. It would be nice to work with the same customer service rep until the issue is resolved.
I would say to make it even better to add more interactive activity and knowledge checks throughout the articles.

Please send me the correct flyers so I don't have to wait for the right ones to come. Look in the system and change this request for good.  I have asked for Lucky and Third grade flyers and continue to be sent Leo and 4th grade. I have ordered for years and not sure why this can't be the same as always.

I mailed two checks in the envelope provide in the student flyers. Those checks have not been received so my account shows an outstanding balance. It has been a month and a half. I am frustated those checks are "missing" or lost. I would like to get this issue solved quickly.

I had a browser issue with submitting an order, but figured it out by trying a different browser, but someone reached out the next day checking on me, but had already checked my account and realized I had figured it out.  I appreciated them letting me know they had checked.  I also emailed about tax exempt and a new invoice, and it was taken care of right away.  Great customer service this week and last week!
Ordered books for Christmas before the cut off date and I received them four days after Christmas.
Your responses were very fast and helpful. You took care of my issues right away. Thank you
I tried calling but the phone line was acting weird. I switched to chat and it was easy and efficient!

I feel bad because I requested the magnets that were mostly missing from our last shipment. Through a misunderstanding, I am being shipped the magnets and the caddies I had ordered. I had already received the caddies in great condition. I don't want to take advantage of the situation. Better packaging. Everything is done in a very timely manner, but most of the time, the boxes are ripped and things are strewn about in the box. Often there are torn and missing items.

Regina was extremely helpful and proactive. She brought up something that I wasn't aware of that should help our school keep our account more secure, and then made the steps/process very clear. Thank you so much!

The person I dealt with was very nice.  The policy that the flyers are not sent every month if you don't order is a struggle.  I believe this to be a new policy, as I have never had to request catalogs before.  In December I was not able to order because of the holiday and we were off of school for awhile because of sickness.

I have been very happy with the speedy response to my query, I do appreciate that we are coming out of the holiday season and have been told the issue will be resolved next week when everyone is back, so hopefully all will be well.

By sending out your flyer and having a student order books I am out $50 because I had to buy books on Amazon prime for my student.  Yes your agent refunded my student order and canceled my teacher order because the box  never got to me. The box that was promised to get to me before Winter break. The books that I made a point to tell my parents would be a great holiday present for their kids. When one of my parents made that order I felt obligated to purchase the books on the reliable Amazon prime. The agent is sending the only book I could not get overnight shipping on and giving me 250 bonus points but the $50 I spent out of my own pocket for my student is out the window for me. :( After many great years with you all I am sorry to say I am not sure if this is worth it anymore.

I ordered a book online that was sold out at the book fair and submitted my debit card information for payment.  My grandson's teacher noticed that I had placed an order and asked me if it was okay to submit my grandson's order the same time that she submitted the class order since I have his books sent to the school.  I told her yes not realizing that her order would not be placed until after the expiration date of my debit card.  I received notice through email that my payment had not gone through so I tried correcting it through the website which it would not let me do.  I tried contacting both numbers..one on the website and the other one that I got through live chat but unfortunately, I have not been able to get through.  The lines are constantly busy.  I have emailed several times and either get an automated response and the same number that I have been calling for a month and a half now.  I did receive the book and am more than happy to pay for it.  I can either give you my phone number so that you can contact me or you can charge me for the book the next time I order because I don't have regular checks to just send you one.  I will most definitely order again before school is out for the summer.  A person can never have to many good books! I wish that the phones would not be constantly busy so that I could correct the issue that I am having.  I also wish that I could update my payment information on the website without having to make a purchase.

Love the live chat feature as it is so very conveinent!  It really is not time consuming and the problem with my book order was resolved very quickly.  I appreciated the excellent customer service very much!  Thank you!
Received our paper order forms today, so now I can hand out
i would like the book order flyers sent to World Compass Academy for Spanish/Bilingual Books at your earliest convenience. Gracias!

I contacted via chat. However, while waiting for a response, I clicked off the box and was then never able to retrieve the message. A new box appeared that said I already had a chat box open, please click to move the conversation. I clicked to move the conversation but nothing happened. I got frustrated, closed all windows, and gave up. I wanted to know how to receive a class set of flyers.  I have not been receiving them this year, so I have not placed any orders.
